name: bulkGetUsers
description:
Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of the users specified by one or more account IDs.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** Permission to access Jira.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

username.description: This parameter is no longer available and will be removed from the documentation soon. See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

key.description: This parameter is no longer available and will be removed from the documentation soon. See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

accountId.description: The account ID of a user. To specify multiple users, pass multiple `accountId` parameters. For example, `accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g&accountId=5b10ac8d82e05b22cc7d4ef5`.

$ul: **isLast**: Whether this is the last page.
**maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**nextPage**: If there is another page of results, the URL of the next page.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned.
